text: he Parisian Cobbler () is a 1928 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Fridrikh Ermler.На кинофестивале "Западные ворота" в Пскове покажут более 50 фильмовАфиша It stars Veronika Buzhinskaya, Bella Chernova, and Yakov Gudkin. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1928 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Parisian Cobbler
